title: MR.SIGA Bottle Brush Cleaning Set with Storage Holder 5 Pack, Straw Cleaner Brush for Long Narrow Neck Bottles, Water Bottles, Baby Bottles, Tumblers, Drinking Glasses, Strews
features: Each bottle brush has unique dimension and shape for different cleaning purpose and hard to reach corners. Stainless steel body, durable and resilient nylon bristles provide excellent cleaning performance, the straw cleaner is odorless and non scratch, work great on glass, plastic, porcelain, aluminum, stainless steel and more.

15.3" Extra long bottle brush for narrow neck bottle easily reaches into long narrow neck wine & beer bottles, carafes, thermos, the baby bottle brush perfect for most bottles with narrow neck and long neck. 13.2" water bottle brush with generous bristles on the top allows cleaning all standard & wide neck bottles and other sports bottles, baby bottles, tumblers and more.

13.2" Long Tube Brush: Used to clean pipes, long and narrow space between machine parts. 8.1" Spout/Lid Brush & Short Bottle Brush: Works great for crevices of lids, spout of kettles etc. 12" Straw Brush: Great for cleaning reusable straws made from silicone or stainless steel thoroughly.

Bottle brush baby comes with a compatible MR.SIGA cleaning brush storage base, which is built with 5 holders and 1 tilted base. The 2 bigger holders are for the 2 big bottle cleaner, while the rest 3 are for the 3 smaller bottle cleaning brush. The tilted base collects drips from baby bottle cleaner.
MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have, we are here for support and advice!
description: Product Description Extra Long Bottle Brush Easily cleans most narrow and long neck bottles. Such as: long and narrow neck wine and beer bottles, carafes, thermos. Wide Neck Bottle Brush The thick bristles on top are designed to clean all standard & wide neck bottles. Such as: sports bottles, baby bottles, tumblers and more. Long Straw Brush Great for cleaning stainless steel, silicone and glass straws, also be used to clean straws in other utensils. Short Bottle Brush Hard bristles to clean coffee, milk, and tea stains, etc, easy cleaning of lid crevices and other dead spaces. Long Tube Brush For cleaning long, narrow spaces between pipes, machine parts. The excellent size design makes the product a great match for narrow water bottles, cups or kettle nozzles, etc. Matching Storage Rack Designed with 5 holders and 1 tilted base. It is easy to store the brushes as well as to dry them, making your chores easier.
